name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior VoIP Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in VoIP technologies, specializing in **Amazon Connect**, **SIP**, **WebRTC**, and **VoLTE**. Proficient in managing and optimizing **PBX** systems, **SS7** signaling, and **SBCs** for enhanced communication solutions. Adept in cloud technologies, particularly **AWS Lambda** to integrate and deploy scalable VoIP applications efficiently.

Possessing strong programming skills in **Python**, I delve into automation and system optimization while leveraging tools like **Jira Software**, **Confluence**, and **Visio** for project management and documentation. I am well-versed in Agile methodologies to ensure adaptive and iterative project delivery, while also utilizing collaboration tools like **Miro** for innovative brainstorming.

In addition to VoIP specialization, my background in full-stack development allows me to implement comprehensive solutions, ensuring seamless integration and superior performance across diverse sectors. My commitment to continuous improvement and collaboration drives successful outcomes in every project.
